text: Ilex pauciflora is a species of plant in the family Aquifoliaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. == Taxonomy== The specific epithet pauciflora is Latin for 'few-flowered'.Allen J. Coombes D. Gledhill ==References== pauciflora Category:Endemic flora of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ilex pauciflora
